003 *  image processing published by Springer-Verlag in various languages and editions.

007 * Visit http://imagingbook.com for additional details.
008 *******************************************************************************/
009
010package imagingbook.lib.image.access;
011
012/**
013 * Instances of this class perform the transformation between 2D image coordinates 
014 * and indexes into the associated 1D pixel array and vice versa.
015 * 
016 * The key method {@link #getIndex(int, int)} returns the 1D array index
017 * for a pair of image coordinates.
018 * It throws an exception when trying to access out-of-image coordinates.
019 * 
020 * The subclasses {@link ZeroValueIndexer}, {@link MirrorImageIndexer} and
021 * {@link NearestBorderIndexer} implement different behaviors for accessing
022 * out-of-image coordinates.
023 * 
024 */
025public abstract class GridIndexer2D implements Cloneable {
026        
027        public static final OutOfBoundsStrategy DefaultOutOfBoundsStrategy = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NEAREST_BORDER;
028        
029        public static GridIndexer2D create(int width, int height, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs) {
030                obs = (obs != null) ? obs : DefaultOutOfBoundsStrategy;
031                switch (obs) {
032                case ZERO_VALUE                 : return new ZeroValueIndexer(width, height);
033                case NEAREST_BORDER             : return new NearestBorderIndexer(width, height);
034                case MIRROR_IMAGE               : return new MirrorImageIndexer(width, height);
035                case THROW_EXCEPTION    : return new ExceptionIndexer(width, height);
036                }
037                return null;
038        }
039        
040        protected final int width;
041        protected final int height;
042        protected final OutOfBoundsStrategy obs;
043
044        private GridIndexer2D(int width, int height, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs) {
045                this.width = width;
046                this.height = height;
047                this.obs = obs;
048        }
049        
050        /**
051         * Returns the 1D array index for a given pair of image coordinates.
052         * Throws an exception when applied to out-of-image coordinates.
053         * Subclasses override this method.
054         * 
055         * @param u x-coordinate
056         * @param v y-coordinate
057         * @return 1D array index
058         */
059        public abstract int getIndex(int u, int v);
060        
061        private int getWithinBoundsIndex(int u, int v) {
062                return width * v + u;
063        }
064        
065        public int getWidth() {
066                return this.width;
067        }
068        
069        public int getHeight() {
070                return this.height;
071        }
072        
073        public OutOfBoundsStrategy getOutOfBoundsStrategy() {
074                return this.obs;
075        }
076        
077        // ---------------------------------------------------------
078
079        /** 
080         * This indexer returns out-of-bounds pixels that
081         * are taken from the closest border pixel. This is the
082         * most common method.
083         */
084        public static class NearestBorderIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
085                
086                NearestBorderIndexer(int width, int height) {
087                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.NEAREST_BORDER);
088                }
089
090                @Override
091                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
092                        if (u < 0) {
093                                u = 0;
094                        }
095                        else if (u >= width) {
096                                u = width - 1;
097                        }
098                        if (v < 0) {
099                                v = 0;
100                        }
101                        else if (v >= height) {
102                                v = height - 1;
103                        }
104                        return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
105                }
106        }
107        
108        /** 
109         * This indexer returns out-of-bound pixels taken from
110         * the mirrored image.
111         */
112        public static class MirrorImageIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
113                
114                MirrorImageIndexer(int width, int height) {
115                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.MIRROR_IMAGE);
116                }
117
118                @Override
119                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
120                        // fast modulo operation for positive divisors only
121                        u = u % width;
122                        if (u < 0) {
123                                u = u + width; 
124                        }
125                        v = v % height;
126                        if (v < 0) {
127                                v = v + height; 
128                        }
129                        return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
130                }
131        }
132        
133        /** 
134         * This indexer returns -1 for out-of-bounds coordinates to
135         * indicate that a (predefined) default value should be used.
136         */
137        public static class ZeroValueIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
138                
139                ZeroValueIndexer(int width, int height) {
140                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZERO_VALUE);
141                }
142
143                @Override
144                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
145                        if (u < 0 || u >= width || v < 0 || v >= height) {
146                                return -1;
147                        }
148                        else {
149                                return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
150                        }
151                }
152        }
153        
154        /**
155         * This indexer throws an exception if out of bounds pixels
156         * are accessed.
157         */
158        public static class ExceptionIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
159                
160                ExceptionIndexer(int width, int height) {
161                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.THROW_EXCEPTION);
162                }
163
164                @Override
165                public int getIndex(int u, int v) throws OutOfImageException {
166                        if (u < 0 || u >= width || v < 0 || v >= height) {
167                                throw new OutOfImageException(
168                                                String.format("out-of-image position [%d,%d]", u, v));
169                        }
170                        else 
171                                return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
172                }
173        }
174        
175        // -----------------------------------------------------------
176        
177        public static class OutOfImageException extends RuntimeException {
178                private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
179                
180                public OutOfImageException(String message) {
181                        super(message);
182                }
183        }
184
185}
186
187
